means: 改变，更改( alter的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The advances in communications altered the nature of information processing.
sentence.Network_cn: 通讯技术的进步使信息处理发生了质的改变。

sentence.Network_en: I don't think it has fundamentally altered the sport.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为它并没有从根本上改变这项运动。

sentence.Network_en: Other projects came up and the emphasis of my work altered.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然来了一些其他的项目，我的工作重点便转移了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Tickets be void of any altered or defaced., 门票如有任何删改或涂污 , 一律作废.
Could I have this skirt altered , please ?, 请把这条短裙改一改可以吗?
later , George Lucas decided that the heavy texture of the spike columns was too distracting , and the set was altered to a smoother look .稍后，乔治·卢卡斯觉得尖顶圆柱的繁重纹理太刺眼，于是又把它们改得比较平滑了。
Interestingly , both E 2 and serum significantly altered the level of proteins involved in protein synthesis ., 研究发现 E2 和血清可显著影响细胞内与蛋白质合成相关的蛋白质的水平.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... alterable 可改变的 alteration 改造，改变 alternation 交互，交错.
变质(alteration)：炎症局部组织发生的变性和坏死　　2、渗出 　　渗出(exudation)：炎症时血管内的液体和细胞成分经血管壁进入到血管外.
新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... alongside prep. 在...旁边 alter vt. 改变，改动 alternative a. 两者挑一的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... agrobiology 农业生物学 alter 变更，改变 alterable 可改变的.

entry.def: If something alters or if you alter it, it changes.

example.ex: Little had altered in the village...
example.tran: 村子里几乎没有什么变化。

example.ex: They have never altered their programmes by a single day.
example.tran: 他们一天也未变更过他们的节目。

means.word_mean: 1. changed in form or character without becoming something else;

sentences.sentence: "following an altered course we soon found ourselves back in civilization"
"he looked...with couded eyes and with an altered manner of breathing"- Charles Dickens

means.word_mean: 3. changed in order to improve or made more fit for a particular purpose;

sentences.sentence: "instructions altered to suit the children's different ages"

auth_sentence.content: It reflected Cale's dope and alcohol altered mindset.
auth_sentence.res_content: It reflected Cale's dope and alcohol altered mindset.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It reflected Cale's dope and alcohol altered mindset.

auth_sentence.content: Not a single flight has been altered or delayed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not a single flight has been altered or delayed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not a single flight has been altered or delayed.

auth_sentence.content: It seems to have altered his idea about truth.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems to have altered his idea about truth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems to have altered his idea about truth.
